body: Anyone whoever felt offended by what I might of said in the past, or any staff members I was mean or rude to, sorry. From now on I'm going to try to contribute to the Avicus community. <u></u>Once again sorry to all the people who were offended by me. From now on no more raging or swearing, or getting angry at staff, time to start new. So people, say hello to the new Luke; hope he's better than the old one!
body_tagged: Anyone whoever felt offended by what I might of said in the past, or any staff members I was mean or rude to, sorry. From now on I'm going to try to contribute to the Avicus community. <u></u>Once again sorry to all the people who were offended by me. From now on no more raging or swearing, or getting angry at staff, time to start new. So people, say hello to the new Luke; hope he's better than the old one!
